titleStmt.title: The grounds of diuinitie plainely discouering the mysteries of Christian religion, propounded familiarly in diuers questions and answeres: substantially proued by scriptures; expounded faithfully, according to the writings of the best diuines, and euidently applyed by profitable vses, for the helpe and benefite of the vnlearned which desire knowledge. To the which is prefixed a very profitable treatise, containing an exhortation to the study of the word, with singular directions for the hearing and reading of the same. By Elnathan Parr minister of the word, at Palgraue in Suffolke.
Grounds of divinitie.
titleStmt.author: Parr, Elnathan, d. 1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. O[kes] for Samuel Man, and are to be sold at his shop, in Pauls church-yard, at the signe of the Ball,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop, in Pauls church-yard, at the signe of the Ball
